metadata.title: CVE-2019-19448 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21 and 5.3.11, mounting a crafted btrfs filesystemimage, performing some operations, and then making a syncfs system call canlead to a use-after-free in try_merge_free_space infs/btrfs/free-space-cache.c because the pointer to a left data structurecan be the same as the pointer to a right data structure.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
